titles.title: Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Open now the crystal fountain, Whence the healing stream doth flow; Let the fire and cloudy pillar Lead me all my journey thro': Strong Deliv'rer, Strong Deliv'rer, Be Thou still my strength and shield; Be Thou still my strength and shield.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When I tread the verge of Jordan, Bid my anxious fears subside; Bear me thro' the swelling current, Land me safe on Canaan's side; Songs of praises, Songs of praises, I will ever give to Thee, I will ever give to Thee.

verse.name: v4
